channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Second security door, 13th November
item.description:
The second security door has dropped and is not locking and catching the floor at the bottom.

item.title: Leaves and moss, 13th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Duddington Close, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous hazard from two paving stones sticking up, 13th November
item.description:
These two paving stones are loose and stick up so far (about three inches) that anyone could easily trip over them and receive a serious injury. Next to these two stones is a square hole (8 inch square?), where some kind of access lid might have been removed. This needs urgent attention. I stepped on one of the stones today before I saw the problem, and it rocked beneath my feet.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brewery Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
